subject: Junit 4.3.1 with maven 1.1 ?
msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to run junit 4 tests under maven 1.1 and am getting the follwing failure - Testsuite: com.HibernateMappingsTest Tests run: 1, Failures: 1,
messageBody:
Hi,

I am trying to run junit 4 tests under maven 1.1 and am getting the
follwing failure -

Testsuite: com.HibernateMappingsTest
Tests run: 1, Failures: 1, Errors: 0, Time elapsed: 0.328 sec

Testcase: warning(junit.framework.TestSuite$1): FAILED
No tests found in com.HibernateMappingsTest
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: No tests found in
com.HibernateMappingsTest

My project.xml includes the following plugin -
<report>maven-junit-report-plugin</report>


Is it possible to run junit4 tests in maven 1.1 ? If so, what plugin
do I need to use or what configuration am I missing ?

I have posted my query on the maven list but haven't got any reply
yet...so thought of asking here if anybody has encountered similar
issues.

Any help in this regard is appreciated.

Thanks
